user_instruction: 'Send my manager Mr. Thompson (thompson@wanderlustadventures.com) an email with a summary of my recent client interactions. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["thompson@wanderlustadventures.com"],"subject":"Summary of Recent Client Interactions","body":"Dear Mr. Thompson,

I hope this email finds you well! Below is a summary of recent client interactions as requested:

- Interaction with Liam: Provided a summary of his luxury tour, confirmed itinerary, accommodations, and special requests. Feedback from Liam has been invaluable, and enhancements based on his suggestions are being implemented. A detailed itinerary along with booking confirmations were also shared.

Please let me know if additional details are required.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: The email summarizing your recent client interactions has been successfully sent to your manager, Mr. Thompson. Let me know if you need further assistance.

final_output: The email summarizing your recent client interactions has been successfully sent to your manager, Mr. Thompson. Let me know if you need further assistance.
